title: Sam Elliott (cricketer)
summary: Sam Elliott (born 18 February 2000) is an Australian cricketer. His father, Matthew, played Test cricket for Australia.In May 2019, Elliott was awarded a rookie contract with Victoria ahead of the 2019–20 season.  He made his List A debut on 8 April 2021, for Victoria in the 2020–21 Marsh One-Day Cup. He made his Twenty20 debut on 5 December 2021, for the Melbourne Stars in the 2021–22 Big Bash League season. He made his first class debut for Victoria on 24 November 2022, against Tasmania in the 2022–23 Sheffield Shield.
